scUnify 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

scUMAP

scUMAP.Rd

Plot UMAP from Seurat object

Usage

scUMAP(
  x,
  reduction = "umap",
  group.by,
  cols = NULL,
  count = F,
  pt.size = NULL,
  legend.ncol = 1,
  ...
)

Arguments

x

Seurat object

reduction

reduction name, defaults to "umap"

group.by

metadata column to group by

cols

a vector of colors, defaults to NULL

count

If TRUE, count the no. of cells for each group. Defaults to FALSE

pt.size

size of each cell/point on UMAP

legend.ncol

no. of columns for group.by keys in legend

...

arguments for Seurat::DimPlot()
